message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a new offer of $14000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am still unable to meet at $14000. I would like to propose $12000 as my maximum offer for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to make another compromise, so I'll offer it to you for $16000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement
